body:
ABSTRACT

Patience Haggin article in Journal Report: The Future of Food notes Climate Institute predicts climate change by 
year 2050 could decrease area in tropics suitable for growing coffee by as much as 50%; notes farmers outside 
traditional coffee-growing regions are already experimenting with crop; map (M)
